about_the_game:
Peter is a young and very ambitious man. One day , he decided that he couldn’t wait any longer and had to hit the road because he had a dream!

In this text-based RPG you will go on a journey and see the world through the Peter ’s eyes. You will meet other heroes, each of whom can influence the course of history. Will you rescue the beautiful stranger? Help a kind old lady? Fulfill a fellow traveler's request? It depends only on you whether Peter can overcome the challenges and fulfill his dream.

  • Study the stories of heroes . Explore the heroes’ stories.
  • Defeat bandits.
  • Upgrade your characteristics.

And don’t forget to take a diary: it will help you make the right choice.

Our Team


We are a small development studio specializing in VR and AR projects.
"Peter’s Journey" is our debut project in Steam and a new experience in creating 2D-games.
The prototype of the game was developed by a studio employe while completing the task in the final of the second season of the All-Russian competition “Start the Game” in the competence of Unity Developer.

The project is completely non-commercial, it is created for the purpose of gaining experience, knowledge and new emotions on pure enthusiasm.
We will be very glad to receive any feedback, suggestions, criticism and comments!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c compatible

short_description: Embark on a journey of this text anime quest with RPG elements! Walk through beautiful locations, overcome challenges and make Peter’s dreams come true. Every step you take matters. And don’t forget to take the diary - you’ll need it!
